Name: Woman in Mask
Description: A well-dressed mysterious person in a mask has appeared on Riccioli Island, but their odd demeanor doesn't match their refined attire.
QuestDesc: A well-dressed mysterious person in a mask has appeared on Riccioli Island, but their odd demeanor doesn't match their refined attire.

Dialogues.Speaker: Strange Girl
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Here, {Male=brother;Female=sister}! I finally caught it! Look how pretty it is!

Dialogues.Speaker: Young Fisherman
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Best keep your distance, friend. There's something off about her. Best not to get too close.

Dialogues.Speaker: Senior Fisherman
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's a strange one. She seemed fine when I offered her some food not long ago...

Dialogues.Speaker: Young Fisherman
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Haven't the slightest clue. Doesn't seem to be from the Riccioli Islands the way she's dressed. Maybe the promise of adventure drew her from the city.

Dialogues.Speaker: Young Fisherman
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Something must've shaken her up. She seems all scrambled in the head.

Dialogues.Speaker: Young Fisherman
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Doesn't seem to be from the Riccioli Islands the way she's dressed. Maybe the promise of adventure drew her from the city.

Dialogues.Speaker: Senior Fisherman
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Unusual fish seem to flock to these waters. City folk love coming here in hope of adding another rare trophy to their exotic collections.

Dialogues.Speaker: Senior Fisherman
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: These unknown waters are perilous. Those who lack respect for them are sure to invite misfortune. Every day, fools set out, never to return, yet still, the lure of adventure continues to draw in newcomers.

Dialogues.Speaker: Senior Fisherman
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I overheard someone say that she and her {Male=brother;Female=sister} arrived asking about fishing some time ago.

Dialogues.Speaker: Senior Fisherman
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I wonder why it's just her now...

Dialogues.Speaker: Young Fisherman
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I can't convince her to leave, and I have no idea who her family might be. Perhaps you could try talking to her again.

Dialogues.Speaker: Dana
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I can't wait to see the look on their faces once I bring this pretty little fish back, {Male=brother;Female=sister}.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Dana extends her scarred arms, revealing the broken pieces of a wine bottle she was holding.

Dialogues.Speaker: Dana
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Huh? {Male=Brother;Female=Sister}, you're hurt.

Dialogues.Speaker: Dana
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, marvelous! Do you remember Uncle Ronald spoke of peculiar fish here that are drawn to people's wounds?

Dialogues.Speaker: Dana
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hurry, we need to head out to sea. We must catch one, even if it costs us our lives! Imagine showing it to everyone in the city!

Options.PlotLineKey: Do you promise to return to the city after we catch this fish?

Dialogues.Speaker: Dana
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Absolutely! I shall be the first to present this fish, and then no one will ever be able to deny that I am truly the greatest collector there is!

Dialogues.Speaker: Dana
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You don't remember? I'll make a sketch for you.

Options.PlotLineKey: Okay, got it. I'll find it.

Dialogues.Speaker: Dana
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: My fish, Uncle Ronald, you promised me you would help me. Where's my fish?!

Dialogues.Speaker: Passing Fisherman
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: W-Who in tarnation are you?! Get away from me!

Dialogues.Speaker: Dana
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It hurts... My face hurts... Please don't bite my face... Save me, {Male=brother;Female=sister}. {Male=Brother;Female=Sister}?

Options.PlotLineKey: Dana? What are you still doing on the island?

Dialogues.Speaker: Dana
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: My fish. The fish you gave me. I can't find it...

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You notice the fish you caught for Dana dangling from her waist, exuding a foul, rotten stench.

Dialogues.Speaker: Dana
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm so sorry! Please don't be angry with me! I'll find your favorite fish and make it up to you!

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Dana quickly scribbles a drawing of a fish.

Dialogues.Speaker: Dana
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This one! You told me it was your favorite fish when we were children! It still is, right? Please tell me I didn't get it wrong.

Options.PlotLineKey: You don't need to go look for it. I already have it.

Dialogues.Speaker: Dana
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What? Where? Did you go out to sea without me? What treasures did you find? Show it to me!

Dialogues.Speaker: Dana
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Fishy... Oh, fishy, fishy... Come out, come out, wherever you are. I got a little treat for you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Dana
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Why the long face? There's plenty of room inside this fish tank, and look at all the lovely little fish keeping you company.

Dialogues.Speaker: Dana
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hey... Did you throw your own {Male=brother;Female=sister} into the sea...?

Dialogues.Speaker: Dana
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, don't cry. I'll help you find it. Anything for my dear {Male=brother;Female=sister}... Yes, anything...

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Trying to convince her to leave isn't getting anywhere. I should find her family and see if they can bring her home.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Dana
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {Male=He;Female=She}'s still in the sea. It's so cold there... I want to find {Male=him;Female=her}.

Dialogues.Speaker: Dana
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I can't go home alone! We made a promise! This is what {Male=he;Female=she} looks like. No, more like... this. I must bring {Male=him;Female=her} back.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Dana scribbles frantically on the ground. She draws a fish.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Suddenly, Dana panics and bolts toward the sea. You catch her just in time.

Dialogues.Speaker: Dana
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Get your hands off me! Who do you think you are?! I am a noble! An invitation bearer! A true collector! Let me go this instant!

Dialogues.Speaker: Dana
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We're here bringing gifts for Mr. Doria. Quick, {Male=brother;Female=sister}. Show him the gifts we prepared.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (If there's a chance she'll mistake that fish for her {Male=brother;Female=sister}, maybe bringing it back will convince her to leave?)

Dialogues.Speaker: Dana
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hmph. Just you wait and see, peasants!

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Dana holds the fish tightly, thrusting it toward the fishermen who recoil in discomfort.

Dialogues.Speaker: Dana
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Take a good look at this fish, Mr. Doria. It's a species thought to be extinct! I spent three days and nights at sea searching for it.

Dialogues.Speaker: Dana
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, Madam Claire, may I join your salon now? I've completed all the extra tasks you set for me. You promised...

Dialogues.Speaker: Onlooking Boatman
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What she got in her hands...? Is that a rotten fish...?

Dialogues.Speaker: Onlooking Fisherman
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I don't understand a word she's saying. Isn't that just a normal fish?

Dialogues.Speaker: Dana
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You gave me your promise! Why would you all lie to me?! WHY?! WHY?!

Dialogues.Speaker: Onlooking Boatman
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Whoa! Easy there, miss! Someone find a way to calm her down!

Options.PlotLineKey: Dana, it's me. Just breathe, please!

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: As Dana notices you, her frantic energy shifts. Tears begin to stream down her face.

Dialogues.Speaker: Dana
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {Male=Brother;Female=Sister}. Oh, {Male=brother;Female=sister}... I'm so sorry... I let you down... I went looking for them, but...

Dialogues.Speaker: Dana
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: They... They kept changing their promises. They never intended to accept us into the family...

Options.PlotLineKey: Don't cry. We'll figure something out.

Dialogues.Speaker: Dana
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Do you really think there's hope? If we offer them another rare fish... will they accept us then?

Options.PlotLineKey: They will. What kind of fish do you have in mind?

Dialogues.Speaker: Dana
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I-I was thinking... What about this one? You can only find it around the Riccioli Islands. It's extremely rare.

Dialogues.Speaker: Dana
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If we catch this fish, does that mean we'll finally bear the family name? Imagine, they might even fetch us in a carriage!

Options.PlotLineKey: Exactly. I'll go get the fish, and you stay here and wait for me, okay?

Dialogues.Speaker: Dana
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Okay. I'll be a good girl. Please be careful, {Male=brother;Female=sister}.

Dialogues.Speaker: Dana
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, dear Madam Claire. Where could you be?

Dialogues.Speaker: Dana
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Do you... not wish to see me?

Options.PlotLineKey: Ah... Madam Claire went out fishing, Dana.

Dialogues.Speaker: Dana
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh... How could this be?!

Dialogues.Speaker: Dana
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wait. Is this a note from Madam Claire?

Dialogues.Speaker: "Claire's Letter"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "The folk from the city grow stranger by the day..."

Dialogues.Speaker: "Claire's Letter"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "Why don't you craft a few specimens to sell, Ronald? It could be a profitable venture."

Dialogues.Speaker: Dana
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So you've been to see Uncle Ronald, haven't you? Madam Claire. I'm coming for you!
